attributes.action: Pay back all the tax payers money used for fraudulant expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lots of MP's now seem to have egg on their faces when it comes to expenses claims. Lots seem to be paying large amounts back now which seems to make you think these claims were fraudulant. So when does the tax payer who funded these claims get their money back!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or with all of the relevant political parties.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
